Sentencas: Heating-up strategies of full scale solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) systems still affect the safe operation of the system and incorporation of the technology into the global energy sector.
Titulo: Safe heating-up of a full scale SOFC system using 3D multiphysics modelling optimisation

Sentencas: To ensure rapid start-up times whilst retaining the structural reliability of the SOFC system components, requires a safe heating-up operation.
Titulo: Safe heating-up of a full scale SOFC system using 3D multiphysics modelling optimisation

Sentencas: To master a controlled heating-up stage, detailed understanding of the component interaction and multiphysics within a fuel cell system is required.
Titulo: Safe heating-up of a full scale SOFC system using 3D multiphysics modelling optimisation

Sentencas: State of the art dynamic fuel cell system modelling comprises sub-models of the assembly, or is based on empirical nature.
Titulo: Safe heating-up of a full scale SOFC system using 3D multiphysics modelling optimisation

Sentencas: However, invaluable information of the multiphysics inside the system is lost.
Titulo: Safe heating-up of a full scale SOFC system using 3D multiphysics modelling optimisation

Sentencas: Therefore, it is of paramount importance to understand and improve the knowledge of the detailed processes, occurring within the interacting components.
Titulo: Safe heating-up of a full scale SOFC system using 3D multiphysics modelling optimisation

Sentencas: The effect of integrating different electrical heater cartridges at different locations has been thoroughly investigated to optimise the heating up of the system.
Titulo: Safe heating-up of a full scale SOFC system using 3D multiphysics modelling optimisation

Sentencas: The study utilises a previously developed and experimentally validated full scale three dimensional planar type SOFC system model to mitigate experimental costs and shed light on the details, occurring within the system.
Titulo: Safe heating-up of a full scale SOFC system using 3D multiphysics modelling optimisation

Sentencas: A comparison to a simplified variant of the model has been added to shed light on its effect on the results.
Titulo: Safe heating-up of a full scale SOFC system using 3D multiphysics modelling optimisation
